tokens.name: VALENTINES / SOL
tokens.ai_reasoning:
**Reasoning:**  
- **BUY/SELL PRESSURE:** Buy/Sell Ratio (22.8) and trade flow (92-93% buys) indicate **strong buying pressure**. Momentum is **STABLE**, so standard aggressive parameters apply.  
- **LIMIT ORDER:** Strong buying pressure overrides volatility (17.3% price change), so **0% (market order)**.  
- **TAKE PROFIT:** Medium volume ($5k) → **+10% to +20%**. Chosen **+12%** for balance.  
- **STOP LOSS:** Medium volatility (17.3% price change) → **-8% to -15%**. Chosen **-10%** for tighter risk.  
- **TIME FRAME:** Medium volatility + stable momentum → **1.5h** (compromise between high/low volatility ranges).
